data.title: Joke Silva Celebrates Husband Olu Jacobs' 82nd Birthday
data.meta_description: Veteran Nollywood actor Olu Jacobs celebrates his 82nd birthday, warmly honored by his wife Joke Silva on Instagram, just weeks after false death rumors.
data.text:
Veteran Nollywood actor, Olu Jacobs, is being celebrated by his wife, Joke Silva, on his 82nd birthday, which falls on Thursday.

This happy occasion comes only two weeks after social media was abuzz with false rumors of his death.To commemorate the milestone, Joke Silva shared a video on Instagram.

To commemorate the milestone, Joke Silva shared a video on Instagram. The video features Olu Jacobs wearing a customized house coat while she showers him with heartfelt prayers and warm wishes.
